title: 346 - 3 Steps for How to Start 2022 Back in Your Creative Sweet Spot

itunes:title: 346 - 3 Steps for How to Start 2022 Back in Your Creative Sweet Spot
itunes:author: Co-Loop Podcast Network
itunes:summary:
There’s nothing quite like that feeling of being exactly where you’re supposed to be on the creative path. You’re seeing 5 steps ahead. Things are coming together in your work with surprising serendipity and satisfying ease. Your progress is meaningful and tangible. 

You’re passionate about what you’re doing and there’s a peace around where you currently find yourself.
In this episode, we explore a process for finding where we are stuck and how to get back into the groove again, so that we can show up in the new year with our best creative selves, full of excitement and motivation.

  In this episode:
 - The Old School Mindset the Holds Most Creators Back
- Identify Which of the 3 Problem Areas You’re Stuck in and How to Beat Them
- The Big shift in Strategy that Changed my Creative Journey  __________
